title: Can not agree to Leavebuster warning? (Help a new player)
body: I've only ever played one game but left since i was just checking. Now I want to play, I just have to agree to the warning but there's no way to select "ok" after I type agree. It's grayed out.

replies.body: I believe that message is actually case sensitive. Make sure you're typing it in exactly as it shows then it should work.
